Description: Available September 1st! Come see this fantastic first floor 2 bed 1 bath apartment located in East Watertown. Just steps from Arsenal Mall, there are many shops, restaurants, public transportation options and so much more. Come enjoy free in-unit laundry and 2 dedicated parking spaces. The property boasts a warm and inviting living area, a kitchen, a dining room, and a serene backyard with a private patio. Hardwood floors throughout. Required Up-Front: First, Last, 1/2 Security and Broker fee. Schedule a Showing! No Pets Allowed (RLNE8160110)
